df

### All variables

df.hist();

## Data loading {.smaller}
```{python}
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv('customer_data.csv')
df
```

## One Variable
```{python}
df['Age'].plot()
```

## All Variables
```{python}
df.plot();
```

## All Variables, log scale for y axis
```{python}
df.plot(logy = True)
```

## Scatter plot
### Two variables

Method 1
```{python}
df.plot(kind='scatter', x = 'Income', y = 'Age')
```

Method 2
```{python}
df.plot.scatter(x = 'Income', y = 'Age')
```
